verbs.description: < p > [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: moved] [ARGM-DIR: up] [ARG1: his planned departure from his summit with Kim Jong Un] [ARGM-TMP: after North Korean officials made plans to leave by the end of the day] , a U.S. official said.

< p > President Donald Trump moved up his [V: planned] [ARG1: departure] from his summit with Kim Jong Un after North Korean officials made plans to leave by the end of the day , a U.S. official said.

< p > President Donald Trump moved up his planned departure from his summit with Kim Jong Un after [ARG0: North Korean officials] [V: made] [ARG1: plans to leave by the end of the day] , a U.S. official said.

< p > President Donald Trump moved up his planned departure from his summit with Kim Jong Un after [ARG0: North Korean officials] made plans to [V: leave] [ARGM-TMP: by the end of the day] , a U.S. official said.
